outputRectangle.description: Optionally defines a region where TTML style captions will be displayed. See Caption Rectangle for more details.

pageNumber.description: Specifies the teletext page number within the data stream from which to extract captions. Range of 0x100 (256) to 0x8FF (2303). Unused for passthrough. Should be specified as a hexadecimal string with no “0x” prefix.
